pr_title: [BEAM-10311] Sharing restriction trackers between SDF and DataSource.

timeline.author: lostluck
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -217,6 +218,11 @@ type ProcessSizedElementsAndRestrictions struct {
 	PDo *ParDo
 
 	inv *ctInvoker
+
+	// rt allows this unit to send out restriction trackers being processed.

replies.bodyText: Fixed. (Also switched the channel from *RTracker to RTracker)
replies.author: youngoli

replies.bodyText: Ah yes. Good catch. Don't use pointers to interface types :)
replies.author: lostluck

timeline.message:
[BEAM-10311] Sharing restriction trackers between SDF and DataSource.

Adding a channel that can be used to retrieve the current restriction
tracker from the DataSource.

[BEAM-10311] Sharing restriction trackers between SDF and DataSource.

Adding a channel that can be used to retrieve the current restriction
tracker from the DataSource.
